Package com.jesusnut.reports.extentreports

Class ExtentLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jesusnut.reports.extentreports.ExtentLogger
  • public final class ExtentLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    ExtentLogger is responsible to log different event's status to Extent Report.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Abhishek Bhardwaj-JesusNut
    See Also:
    ScreenshotUtils, ExtentManager, ExtentReportListener, ConfigFactory, MediaEntityBuilder.createScreenCaptureFromBase64String(String), MarkupHelper

      ExtentLogger()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void fail​(java.lang.String message)
      Helps log a failed event along with Base64 screenshots to extent report.
      static void info​(java.lang.String message)
      Helps log an information event in INDIGO color to extent report.
      static void info​(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
      Helps log an information event to extent report.
      static void logCustomStatus​(com.aventstack.extentreports.Status status, java.lang.Throwable t)
      Helps log any custom event to extent report.
      static void pass​(java.lang.String message)
      Helps log a passed event to extent report.
      Appends base64 screenshots if ConfigFactory.hasPassedStepsScreenshots() is set to true.
      static void skip​(java.lang.String message)
      Helps log a skipped event to extent report.

    • Method Detail

      • pass

        public static void pass​(java.lang.String message)
        Helps log a passed event to extent report.
        Appends base64 screenshots if ConfigFactory.hasPassedStepsScreenshots() is set to true.
        Parameters:
        message - - message that user wants to log along with a passed event in String format
        See Also:
        Ignitor, JSUtils

      • fail

        public static void fail​(java.lang.String message)
        Helps log a failed event along with Base64 screenshots to extent report.
        Parameters:
        message - - message that user wants to log along with a failed event in String format

      • info

        public static void info​(java.lang.String message)
        Helps log an information event in INDIGO color to extent report.
        Parameters:
        message - - message that user wants to log along with an information event in String format

      • info

        public static void info​(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        Helps log an information event to extent report.
        Parameters:
        throwable - throwable cause for failure

      • skip

        public static void skip​(java.lang.String message)
        Helps log a skipped event to extent report.
        Parameters:
        message - - message that user wants to log along with a skipped event in String format

      • logCustomStatus

        public static void logCustomStatus​(com.aventstack.extentreports.Status status,

        Helps log any custom event to extent report.
        Parameters:

        t - throwable cause for event
